summary: @fedor@mastodon.gamedev.place @clementd@framapiaf.org @github I honestly think this is pretty disappointing to see. I could understand it if you were still in the hype cycle of VC investment backed services, but you're not, so I really don't understand the jump onto the AI band wagon.
